entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: SW 32 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming north 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 8 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
